::Hot Rod/Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm::

Gemeni Dragon's blast shot Hot Rod back. He slowly got back to his feet.
He fired four laser at Gemeni Dragon's head.

Blyer and Firearm avoided Speed Vipers attacks, but Rixer was hit by the
optic, sending him back avoiding the slashes. The three of them fired
two lasers, and one optic each at Speed Viper.
